name: The Cursed Forest Original Soundtrack
detailed_description:
ATTENTION!

We made this DLC so you will be able to support our future creative work if you would like.

Also, if you want you can listen this music for free here: https://youtu.be/3kJpSDQQ_ys
Download for free all music and art you can here: https://yadi.sk/d/ygtkzKNiZiWs_w


About the Game

On The Cursed Forest music worked two composers Konstantin Shmyrev and Nikita Yamov + Ann Yakubenko vocal. Also, in DLC we included some art that was made by Vladyslav Liedienov.

Nikita Yamov:

  • Downward
  • End Credits
  • Farewell
  • Into the Darkness
  • On the Cliff
  • The Dawn
  • The Winding Path Ahead
  • Bonus Track 1
  • Bonus Track 2

Konstantin Shmyrev:

  • Curse
  • Curse and Wonder
  • Hide and seek with Sarah
  • House+Build+up
  • Main menu
  • Main theme
  • The Cursed Forest teaser
  • The Drive
  • Bonus Track 1
  • Bonus Track 2

DLC files will be in the main directory in the OST folder:
.\STEAM\steamapps\common\The Cursed Forest\OST
